She then pushed the boy and said, "What did your father teach you at home? What do you want us to do?" Then, the moment she saw that he couldn't speak, she laughed and said, "I know what you mean." Then, she asked Zhou Rui's wife, "Has the old lady had breakfast yet?" Liu Fa' er quickly replied, "We came early this morning, so we haven't had time to eat yet." Then, she ordered someone to bring them some food.
paragraphs.chinese: 刘姥姥刚刚安顿好，就说：“我带着你侄儿来，不是别的，是因为他爹娘没钱吃，天气又冷，只好带着你侄儿来见你。”说着，又推着板儿说：“你爹在家里怎么教你的？让我们来做什么事？只顾吃果子！”凤姐已经明白了，看到他不会说话，就笑着说：“不用说了，我知道了。”然后问周瑞家的：“这位姥姥有没有吃过早饭？”刘姥姥忙说：“一大早赶来的，哪还有吃饭的工夫啊。”凤姐就命人传饭来。

paragraphs.original: 一时，周瑞家的传了一桌客馔摆在东屋里，过来带了刘姥姥和板儿过去吃饭。凤姐这里道：“周姐姐，好生让著些儿，我不能陪了。”一面又叫过周瑞家的来问道：“方才回了太太，太太怎么说了？”周瑞家的道：“太太说：‘他们原不是一家子；当年他们的祖和太老爷在一处做官，因连了宗的。这几年不大走动。当时他们来了，却也从没空过的；如今来瞧我们，也是他的好意，别简慢了他。要有什么话，叫二奶奶裁夺著就是了。’”凤姐听了说道：“怪道，既是一家子，我怎么连影儿也不知道？”说话间，刘姥姥已吃完了饭，拉了板儿过来，舔唇咂嘴的道谢。凤姐笑道：“且请坐下，听我告诉你：方才你的意思，我已经知道了。论起亲戚来，原该不等上门就有照应才是。但只如今家里事情太多，太太上了年纪，一时想不到是有的。我如今接著管事，这些亲戚们又都不大知道，况且外面看著虽是烈烈轰轰，不知大有大的难处，说给人也未必信。你既大远的来了，又是头一遭儿和我张个口，怎么叫你空回去呢？可巧昨儿太太给我的丫头们作衣裳的二十两银子还没动呢，你不嫌少，先拿了去用罢。”那刘姥姥先听见告艰苦，只当是没想头了；又听见给他二十两银子，喜的眉开眼笑道：“我们也知道艰难的，但只俗语说的：‘瘦死的骆驼比马还大呢。’凭他怎样，你老拔一根寒毛，比我们的腰还壮哩！”周瑞家的在旁听见他说的粗鄙，只管使眼色止他。凤姐笑而不睬，叫平儿把昨儿那包银子拿来，再拿一串钱，都送至刘姥姥跟前。凤姐道：“这是二十两银子，暂且给这孩子们作件冬衣罢。改日没事，只管来逛逛，才是亲戚们的意思。天也晚了，不虚留你们了。到家，该问好的都问个好儿罢。”一面说，一面就站起来了。
paragraphs.english: At that time, Zhou Rui's family served a table of guests in the east room and came over to bring Liu姥姥 and Bando to eat. Feng Zhen said, "Zhou sister, take care of him and I can't accompany you." At the same time, she called Zhou Rui's family over and asked, "Did you report back to the lady? What did the lady say?" Zhou Rui's family said, "The lady said, 'They were originally a family. Their ancestors and the old gentleman used to serve together. They were connected. For several years, they didn't have much contact. When they came, they didn't have a chance to see us. Now they come to visit us, it's his good will. Don't be rude to him. If there is anything to say, let Mrs. Feng decide." Feng Zhen said, "That's why, as a relative, we should not wait for the other party to come before we offer help." Speaking of this, Liu姥姥 had already finished eating, and he pulled Bando over to lick his lips and say thank you. Feng Zhen laughed and said, "Please sit down and listen to me tell you: Your intention has already been known. As“Now that there are so many things at home, my mother is getting old, and it is not easy to remember everything. I am now in charge of the household affairs, and these relatives do not know much about them. In addition, although it looks lively on the outside, there is a lot of trouble in it, and it is not easy to explain to others. You came a long way and this is your first time talking to me. How could I let you leave without anything? Yesterday, my mother gave me twenty silver taels for my maid's clothes, and I haven't used them yet. Don't think it's too little if you don't mind. Take it and use it. R姥姥 was delighted to hear that there was still hope, and he was overjoyed at the twenty silver taels. Zhou Rui's family, who was standing nearby, made eye gestures to stop him. Fengzheng laughed and did not answer, called Ping'er to take out the silver taels yesterday, and then took a string of coins, and handed them to R姥姥. Fengzheng said, "This is twenty silver taels, which is enough for these children to buy winter clothes. Please come and visit us when you have time.

paragraphs.original: 刘姥姥只是千恩万谢的，拿了银钱，跟著周瑞家的走到外边。周瑞家的道：“我的娘！你怎么见了他倒不会说话了呢？开口就是‘你侄儿’。我说句不怕你恼的话：就是亲侄儿也要说的和软些儿。那蓉大爷才是他的侄儿呢，他怎么又跑出这么个侄儿来了呢！”刘姥姥笑道：“我的嫂子，我见了他，心眼儿爱还爱不过来，那里还说的上话来！”二人说著，又到周瑞家坐了片刻。刘姥姥要留下一块银子给周瑞家的孩子们买果子吃。周瑞家的那里放在眼里？执意不肯。刘姥姥感谢不尽，仍从后门去了。
paragraphs.english: Liu Fengyao only thanked and thanked, and took the silver, and followed Zhou Rui's wife to the outside. Zhou Rui's wife said, "Oh, my mother! How could you not be able to speak to him? You just said 'my nephew'. I have to say something that might offend you: even if it's a close relative, you should speak softly. That Rong Daren is his nephew, but how did he run into this nephew? " Liu Fengyao laughed, "My sister, I'm so fond of him that I don't even know how to speak. How could I talk to him?" The two of them talked for a while longer. Liu Fengyao wanted to leave a silver coin for Zhou Rui's wife's children to buy fruit. Zhou Rui's wife didn't even look at it. Liu Fengyao was grateful beyond words, and left from the back door.

paragraphs.english: I don't know what will happen after I leave, so I'll just wait and see what happens next.
